name: Open2America
overview:
Open2America is a global communications agency with offices in Europe (Open2Europe, created in 2000) and China (Open2China, created in 2010). The agencyâ€™s objective is to support businesses looking to launch or develop their activities in these regions by offering them a complete range of tailored communication services, including: PR, media training, investor relations, digital communication, media buying and corporate communication.

Positioning itself as a business development partner, this global communications agency benefits from its international presence and in-depth local market knowledge to offer clients strategic consultancy with a multicultural approach. The agencyâ€™s expertise is focused within the following sectors: consumer goods and services, sustainable development, new technologies, health & beauty, and tourism.

More than 100 companies currently work with Open2America, Open2Europe and Open2China and the agency employs over 80 consultants from 25 different nationalities.
